sentences.en: She has a kind of idolatry.

sentences.en: The greatest prophet of the Old Testament, he sought to abolish idolatry and restore justice.

sentences.en: The queen was adored to the point of idolatry.

sentences.en: Their affection for her soon increased almost to idolatry.
sentences.cn: 他们对她的喜爱不久就发展到了盲目崇拜的地步。

sentences.en: Therefore, my beloved, flee from idolatry.

sentences.en: Wherefore, my dearly beloved, flee from idolatry.
